channel.title: HYDRANS - Wind | The Remixes: Pt. 1 & 2
channel.description:
HYDRANS - Wind | The Remixes: Pt. 1 & 2 *headphones recommended*
Hello everyone! I am super excited to bring you the remixes of my song Wind now that my remix contest has come to a close! Thanks to everyone who entered! Make sure to check out all of the artists and their music!
[HYDRANS - Wind | The Remixes: Pt. 1](https://soundcloud.com/hydrans/sets/hydrans-wind-the-remixes-pt-1) [HYDRANS - Wind | The Remixes: Pt. 2](https://soundcloud.com/hydrans/sets/hydrans-wind-the-remixes-pt-2)
Original Song: [HYDRANS - Wind](https://soundcloud.com/hydrans/wind)
Contest Thread: https://disco.auxy.co/t/wind-the-remixes-contest/11495
![Copy%20of%20%E3%83%92%E3%83%89%E3%83%A9%E3%83%B3|500x500](upload://3gGfLb9rPF789nnoleP0Q5aCBVX.png)
Thanks! ~ HYDRANS

item.title: HYDRANS - Wind | The Remixes: Pt. 1 & 2
item.dc:creator: R-JRDN
item.description:
I loved remixing this song a lot! Everyone did such a good job, even you @Mr_Mooo. Looking forward to listening to your music in the future!
